original_title: Iron Maiden: The Legacy of the Beast
overview: Discover the history and legacy of Iron Maiden, the quintessential heavy metal rock band from England. This rockumentary captures everything fans want to know about the group, from their less-than-stellar beginnings, influences and competitors to their failures and successes and more. Chock-full of never-before-seen footage and interviews with fans and friends, Legacy of the Beast aims to explain Iron Maiden's influence on the world of music.
title: Iron Maiden: The Legacy of the Beast
